ModMetaData.name: [KV] Save Storage, Outfit, Crafting, & Drug Settings - 1.0
ModMetaData.author: Kiame Vivacity
ModMetaData.description:
Save and Load Dump/Stockpile and Outfit settings. These saves can be carried over from new games to old saves.
Future Plans: Add support for other types of Storage Zones.
Thank you to the translators: -Proxyer for Japanese
